header: Planning and support in succession processes in Mexico and abroad
text: As a consequence of the increasingly complex composition of Mexican families, in which their members often have multiple nationalities, investments in various jurisdictions or the desire to migrate temporarily or permanently to another jurisdiction, it is essential to plan in advance and carefully. adequately form the succession of your assets, have the necessary documentation so that each member who is part of the succession has control of the inherited assets and avoids inheritance or property taxes provided for in legislation other than Mexican legislation.
